meanings.definition: Messages distributed electronically from one computer user to one or more recipients via a network.
meanings.sent1: I receive many emails from my friends every day.
meanings.sent2: She checked her emails first thing in the morning.
meanings.sent3: The cat accidentally sent emails to all the dogs in the neighborhood.
meanings.sent4: Her inbox was a garden of emails waiting to be read.
meanings.sent5: The sound of incoming emails filled the office with a constant buzz.

meanings.definition: The system for using such messages.
meanings.sent1: Our company's emails are secure and efficient.
meanings.sent2: He manages the emails for the entire organization.
meanings.sent3: The emails were so organized that even the robots were impressed.
meanings.sent4: The emails flowed through the network like a well-oiled machine.
meanings.sent5: She mastered the art of emails and became the go-to person for communication.
